OOC: Sorry for my absence. ISP problems. I'll post briefly with all my char=
s here. If I need to respond personally to anything I missed just tell me.
=
=A0
::Lord Jhiaxus::
=A0
Jhiaxus pulls up after his missiles detonate and c=
omes about. He fires two more at the same target.
=A0
::Scorponok::
=A0
Wit=
h only four Sweeps left on him, Scorponok fires his gun batteries in a patt=
ern that should drive them all towards his left... and right where the rock=
et he just fired will strike.
=A0
::Lord Elder/Grimlock::
=A0
They continue=
 the gun play with the Minion Tumult and any others the spot.
=A0
::Dark Ro=
dimus::
=A0
Rodimus was back on his feet, facing Cyclonus, in a fighting po=
se. As Cyc's palms glowed with energy, ready to strike, Rodimus locked on h=
is over-shoulder rockets.
=A0
Rodimus: The difference is I don't know that =
part of my past any longer. I HAVE NO RULES!
=A0
With Cyclonus hopefully pr=
epared for a projectile attack Rodimus does the unexpected. With the aid of=
 his thrusters he comes right at Cyclonus, attempting to spear tackle him d=
own.
=A0
::Kup::
=A0
As all this is happening, another Maximal shuttle swoo=
ps into the area. Kup keeps the speed up to punch through any mobs of Sweep=
s. At the very last minute he lands with thrusters. He lands the shuttle ri=
ght in front of the blockade doors protecting the Ark. He brings the shield=
s online. With a quick scan he locks the weapon batteries on the same targe=
t that everyone else is shooting at: poor Tumult!

--- On Tue, 7/22/08, Sup=
er Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: Super Cyclonus <supercy=
clonus@...>
Subject: Re: The War of the ARK!
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om
Date: Tuesday, July 22, 2008, 5:33 PM










Lord Elder continues to =
pound away at the air, with the Ark and shuttle batteries opening up on the=
 one Minion who is present: Tumult! The minion is fast and agile, using the=
 air to his best advantage, and the sweeps that litter the skies almost as =
cover. The single minion takes off, drawing fire away from the besieging sw=
eeps, his agility serving him in good stead as he maneuvers tightly in the =
skies, his armor becoming peppered with the few shots fortunate enough to a=
ctually hit him! ------------ --------- --------- --------- ----- Meanwhile=
 Legacy=92s shielding continues to hold due to a new influx of power coming=
 from the Ark. With a renewed vigor Legacy=92s weapons orient on the incomi=
ng minion sweeps and fires, a bright flash of light erupting from his prima=
ry cannon mount. His armored tank mode a stalwart defender of the ark! ----=
-------- --------- --------- --------- ----- As this happened twin missiles=
 fly out from just behind the main part of
 the battle lines, sailing throu=
gh the midst of the host of sweeps fixing themselves on target. With a burs=
t of power Jhiaxus=92 missiles push forward towards Tumult! The minion sold=
ier for his part has not been paying the proper attention, seeing as he has=
 been spending his time avoiding the copious amounts of fire power coming f=
rom the Maximals and Autbots at the ark - so it is not until the last secon=
d that his proximity and lock on alerts come to life, just before Jhiaxus=
=92 missiles hit him dead on and his world erupts in light and pain!! At th=
e same time Myrmidon fired several shots at the encroaching sweeps, keeping=
 them off Jhiaxus! However the six-changer takes several hits as well, the =
last few biting through his armor! He begins to circle towards the ground! =
------------ --------- --------- --------- ----- Nighstrike DarkFate moved =
closer the ark and opened fire against it, their twin fire power opening a =
new level of explosive power against
 the ark=92s shield strength. Once aga=
in the shielding flicker, stutters and then with a sickening suddenness the=
 shield dies, as what appears to be a ball of darkness engulfs the immediat=
e area around the ark! ------------ --------- --------- --------- ----- Mea=
nwhile Scorponok=92s tail attacks are remarkably effective. Perhaps they we=
re not expecting something like that, or perhaps something else is brewing =
in the air! At any rate twin explosions appear as two more sweeps fall to t=
he ground. Four are left, flying attack patterns, harrying the lone Scorpon=
ok! But they are now more wary and cautious then before as they fire again =
and weave their way through the air around him. ------------ --------- ----=
----- --------- ----- Hydras=92 transformation into beast mode causes the s=
weeps attacking him to back up for a moment as several are fried by the out=
pouring of heat and fire! Decibel for her part pulled up, allowing the swee=
ps to take the brunt of the
 attack. =93Is that all you got. Bad breath???=
=94 She howls with laughter as she banks around, =93Take a tic tac!=94 she =
fires twin missiles at Hydras as the other sweeps come around to also help =
her take on the predicon commander! ------------ --------- --------- ------=
--- ----- Cyclonus watched as Dark Rodimus came down, as a strange calmness=
 emanating from him. Rodimus=92 kick is perhaps faster than cyclonus had an=
ticipated or perhaps he simply allowed it to hit, in either case the minion=
 commander rolled with the sweeping kick and hit the ground shoulder first =
and continued spinning to rise elegantly to his feet. Cyclonus shook his he=
ad as he looked at Rodimus rather than attacking, =93The power you once had=
, the power of the matrix, its wisdom, its knowledge is now coursing throug=
h my circuits. I have power you do not yet understand, or perhaps have just=
 forgotten. You are less than what you were before and I am more. How do yo=
u propose to beat
 me?=94 Cyclonus shrugged slightly as he settled into a c=
ombat stance, his palms beginning to glow once more, =93Were it up to me I =
would let you live. But it is not up to me.=94 Cyclonus gestured to Rodimus=
 to attack when he was ready, =93Come to your death, Unicron has decreed it=
!=94 Preston (Da=92minion)
